GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
mtd: parsers: ofpart: Fix refcount leak in bcm4908_partitions_fw_offset

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 762475464982b15014f364ec0cf2a843407f5af1, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit bb17230c61a6424b622e92006ec52ba23aa5a967. For more details please see the references link.
